dao

Class QueriesDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.QueriesDAO

  • public class QueriesDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    QueriesDAO class contains all the queries on the databases needed for the project.
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Paolo D'Arienzo

      • getBrands

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBrands()
                                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Queries the database looking for all the brands
        Returns:
        the list of brands present in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database

      • getInstrumentType

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInstrumentType()
                                                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Queries the database looking for all the instrument types
        Returns:
        the list of instrument types present in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database

      • getProducts

        public static java.util.List<Product> getProducts(java.lang.Boolean searchStringIsVoid,
                                                  java.lang.String search,
                                                  java.lang.String brandSelected,
                                                  java.lang.String selectedInstrumentType,
                                                  java.lang.String selectedUsedStatus,
                                                  java.lang.String selectedProductType)
                                           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                  java.net.UnknownHostException
        Queries the database looking for all the products with the indicated filters
        Parameters:
        searchStringIsVoid - if true, the search string is void
        search - is the string containing all the keywords to look for
        brandSelected - is the filter for the brand
        selectedInstrumentType - is the filter for the instrument type
        selectedUsedStatus - is the filter for the used status
        selectedProductType - is the filter of the product type
        Returns:
        the list of products found in the database with the indicated filters
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if an error occurs with the determination of the IP address

      • maxIDInDatabase

        public static int maxIDInDatabase(java.lang.String tabella)
                           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Executes a query on the database strumenti_database, on the table indicated, in search of the maximum value of ID.
        Parameters:
        tabella - is the table in which searching the maximum value
        Returns:
        an int representing the maximum value found for the ID
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database
